title: Maitre
creator_credit: Jacques Leroux, Manuel Otero, Paris Cite Productions and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: This animated film is an abstract expression of the dilemma of the artist in his search for recognition. The source and process of artistic inspiration are explored as well as the artist’s reactions to his own failure and success. No commentary, music only.
creator_credit_for_label: Jacques Leroux, Manuel Otero, Paris Cite Productions and Weston Woods Studios
